textBox.richText: The 2013 season went out with a bang...we had the powder day last sunday, followed by a bunch more monday (along with a closed pass). Was thinking about catching powder flu on wed, but the snow didn’t pan out. Instead, there was a blast wednesday afternoon, so I headed up then. Got 6” wednesday night...and had a great ditch day thursday. Saturday and sunday only had dustings...but still, they kept eagle and parsenn and the ridge open for closing weekend, so I can’t complain. Charts below...didn’t stick around for the C-Lift festivities on sunday...not enough energy. :)
